original: 曹操滅袁氏、討烏桓，定北方，遂興南征之志，鑿玄武池操練水軍。建安十三年（208年）秋，曹軍下荊州，劉表病故，次子劉琮降曹。
text: Cao Cao destroyed the Yuan clan, discussed Wuhuan, set the north, then prospered the ambitions of the south, drilled the navy in the Xuanwu Pool. In the autumn of the 13th year of Jian'an (208), Cao Jun went to Jingzhou, Liu Biao died of illness, and his second son Liu Cong came to Cao.
